description: This trap is generated when the device finds that the portal server
is unreachable, the portal server's name is hpnicfPortalServerName, and
the portal server's IP is hpnicfPortalServerIP, and the portal server's
port is hpnicfPortalServerPort, and the portal server has been enabled.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerLost HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalFirstTrapTime t 31536000 HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerIP s EXAM HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerPort i 9999

description: It is the index of the table of hpnicfPortalServerTable, it shows
the name of the portal server.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerName

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalFirstTrapTime

description: The portal server's IP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerIP

description: It shows the UDP port of the portal server.
The port will be used when client sends packets to portal server.
Default value is 50100.
It is not configurable when the portal server has been enabled.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerPort

description: This trap is generated when the device finds that the state of portal
server changes from unreachable state to reachable
the portal server's name is hpnicfPortalServerName, and the portal server's
IP is hpnicfPortalServerIP, and the portal server's port is hpnicfPortalServerPort
and the portal server has been enabled.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerGet HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalFirstTrapTime t 31536000 HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerIP s EXAM HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerPort i 9999

description: It is the index of the table of hpnicfPortalServerTable, it shows
the name of the portal server.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerName

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalFirstTrapTime

description: The portal server's IP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerIP

description: It shows the UDP port of the portal server.
The port will be used when client sends packets to portal server.
Default value is 50100.
It is not configurable when the portal server has been enabled.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PORTAL-MIB::hpnicfPortalServerPort
